tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE smart_contract_templates (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   contract_name TEXT NOT NULL,
   contract_code TEXT NOT NULL,
   deploy_date TIMESTAMP,
   author TEXT,
   blockchain_platform TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE contract_executions (
    execution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT NOT NULL,
    execution_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    execution_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_executions (
    execution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    execution_date DATE,
    execution_status VARCHAR(50),
    execution_result TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE contract_parameters (
    parameter_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id),
    parameter_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    data_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE contract_parties (
    party_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id),
    party_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE contract_events (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id),
    event_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
